title: Can we FINALLY see what skins we OWN?!?!?
body:
I was checking out Surrenderat20 and found in the latest news something quite interesting:

"Miscellaneous 
Just over 700 "Splash_Tile" assets were added in today's update. These are small square cut outs of each champion and skin. Not sure what these will be used for based on file destination.
Here are a few examples:
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KNauO92kSMw/VkKLxPMu9bI/AAAAAAAA0Qw/MzrrhBlyBvQ/s200/Zed_Splash_Tile_3.jpg
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-cLYJ1L70l1I/VkKLwvEFY7I/AAAAAAAA0QU/aWtQVRCcO3o/s200/Swain_Splash_Tile_0.jpg
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-x-cWJCeD49U/VkKLw0E5w5I/AAAAAAAA0Qg/ikM6_GR0ZPs/s200/Thresh_Splash_Tile_2.jpg
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-o_KisarsIFk/VkKLxIaaJZI/AAAAAAAA0Qk/SQJQdennCII/s200/Yasuo_Splash_Tile_2.jpg
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-X1Eb0RAPXxk/VkKLxEuwJFI/AAAAAAAA0Qs/MUYwEtucYC8/s200/Zac_Splash_Tile_2.jpg

Looks like various tooltips for masteries have been cleaned up, no effect changes."

Riot, does this mean we can finally see the skins we own?
